property.name: entityType
property.label: entityType
property.description: Use this attribute to indicate the entity being modified/created. Eg : Debtor, Secured Party, Assignor, etc.

property.name: typedescription
property.label: Description
property.description: Use this description to display related information about the member type being created/ modified.

property.name: lienType
property.label: lienType
property.description: specifies the Lien type selected for filling
